def quick_sort(array):
    pass


def partition(array, pivot_idx):
    """
    Partition array into arrays of items smaller and larger than pivot.

    >>> partition([2, 8, 7, 1, 3, 5, 6, 4], 7)
    [2, 1, 3, 4, 7, 5, 6, 8]
    """
    i = -1
    pivot = array[pivot_idx]
    for j, item in enumerate(array):
        if item <= pivot and j < len(array) - 1:
            i += 1
            swap(array, i, j)
    swap(array, i + 1, pivot_idx)
    return array


def swap(array, first_idx, second_idx):
    """
    Swap two elements in an array.

    >>> swap([13, 31], 0, 1)
    [31, 13]
    """
    array[first_idx], array[second_idx] = array[second_idx], array[first_idx]
    return array
